Package OOP_Project.application.controller

Class restController

  • java.lang.Object
    • OOP_Project.application.controller.restController
  • @RestController
public class restController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Bedetta Alessandro

    This class maps all the routes that the user can use. each route is linked to a specific method in the 'memory' class. If the user hasn't had his credentials checked already, he won't be able to access any route Any any error that may show up during runtime in this phase is handled by the 'errorHandler' class

    See Also:
    OOP_Project.application.handlers.errorHandler

    • Method Detail

      • Daily_Revs

        @PostMapping("/dailyRev/{file}")
public java.lang.String Daily_Revs​(@RequestParam(name="date")
                                   java.lang.String date,
                                   @PathVariable
                                   java.lang.String file)
        This route allows the user to have a list of all the reviews made on a specific file on a precise day
        Parameters:
        date - Indicating the date
        file - Indicating the file to analyze
        Returns:
        A String representing a JSONArray containing all the reviews.

      • Check_User

        @PostMapping("/check")
public java.lang.String Check_User​(@RequestParam(name="token")
                                   java.lang.String token,
                                   @RequestParam(name="path",defaultValue="")
                                   java.lang.String path)
        Once the user gives a directory path and an access token, this route allows the credentials authentication
        Parameters:
        token - Indicating the access token to the DropBox API
        path - Indicating the directory path (default = home folder)
        Returns:
        If the authentication process goes well, a JSON representing the certified user is returned, otherwise the application responds with an error

      • List_Review

        @GetMapping("/listRev/{file}")
public java.lang.String List_Review​(@PathVariable
                                    java.lang.String file)
        This is the basic route that allows the user to list all the reviews made on a specific file
        Parameters:
        file - Indicates the file we want to check
        Returns:
        A String representing a JSONArray filled with the list of all the file reviews

      • Stats

        @GetMapping("/stats/{file}")
public java.lang.String Stats​(@PathVariable
                              java.lang.String file)
        Once the user feeds a file name, this route returns a set of statistics regarding timing between reviews
        Parameters:
        file - Indicating the file to analyze
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON String containing all the statistics made and the relative values

      • Help

        @GetMapping("/help")
public java.lang.String Help()
        This route allows the user to access a quick guide to all of the application features
        Returns:
        A String of text ( the guide )
